summary: Client Sarah opened the vision meeting and the PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA had no comments or were not addressed.

actions.task: Propose and finalize the project name (collect name options and obtain agreement)

risks.risk: No project name was decided during the meeting, which could delay kickoff and initial planning.
risks.mitigation: PM to propose name options and secure a decision via follow-up or by the next meeting; set a deadline for selection.
